short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open documents straight from Clio, get free PACER looks, and much, much more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser Link works with Faster Suite to give you easy access to all your Clio files with local editing and saving capabilities.

This extension requires:
Faster Suite for Windows
